name: chorus-workspace
description: Chorus multi-agent orchestration system - workspace root

scripts.build:tools: cd packages/tools && gren make FileToolsMain --output=build/file-tools-tmp && tail -n +2 build/file-tools-tmp > build/file-tools.js && bun build --compile build/file-tools.js --outfile build/file-tools && rm build/file-tools-tmp build/file-tools.js && gren make HandoffMain --output=build/handoff-tool-tmp && tail -n +2 build/handoff-tool-tmp > build/handoff-tool.js && bun build --compile build/handoff-tool.js --outfile build/handoff-tool && rm build/handoff-tool-tmp build/handoff-tool.js && gren make TaskToolsMain --output=build/task-tools-tmp && tail -n +2 build/task-tools-tmp > build/task-tools.js && bun build --compile build/task-tools.js --outfile build/task-tools && rm build/task-tools-tmp build/task-tools.js && gren make ChorusToolsMain --output=build/chorus-tools-tmp && tail -n +2 build/chorus-tools-tmp > build/chorus-tools.js && bun build --compile build/chorus-tools.js --outfile build/chorus-tools && rm build/chorus-tools-tmp build/chorus-tools.js
scripts.build:chorus: cd packages/chorus && gren make Main --output=build/chorus-tmp && tail -n +2 build/chorus-tmp > build/chorus.js && rm build/chorus-tmp && ../../scripts/patch-bun-compat.sh build/chorus.js && bun build --compile build/chorus.js --outfile build/chorus && rm build/chorus.js
scripts.build:app: npm run build:ui && npm run build:tools && npm run build:chorus
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/build packages/*/.gren packages/*/gren_packages dist/chorus dist/static dist/tools
